meanings.definition: To make or become Italian in character or style.
meanings.sent1: She italianated her pasta dish by adding fresh basil and tomatoes.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's decor was italianated with paintings of the Italian countryside.
meanings.sent3: He italianated his outfit by wearing a red, green, and white scarf.
meanings.sent4: The garden was italianated with statues of Roman gods and goddesses.
meanings.sent5: The music room was italianated with opera posters and Italian flags.

meanings.definition: To imitate or adopt Italian customs or traditions.
meanings.sent1: The chef italianated his cooking style after studying in Italy.
meanings.sent2: The festival featured dancers italianated in traditional Italian attire.
meanings.sent3: She italianated her speech by using Italian hand gestures.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibit was italianated with works inspired by famous Italian painters.
meanings.sent5: The family italianated their holiday celebrations with Italian recipes and songs.
